Name: Descending I - House of Nightmares
About the game: Descending is a VR horror game with puzzle elements. You play as the new owner of a house and your goal is to break the curse that was cast upon the estate. You will discover the secrets of the past also you will face the terror what lurks in the rooms. Can you survive or will you die over and over again...?
